TopicTitle: Dawn of a new Er-- User.

Articles.Content:
Ohaidar. I've been lurking around (Oh no another lurker!) since...The rover update? Forgot the version number. There has been several times where i was like, maybe i should do that whole registering thing.... Naaaah. However, seeing that 1.0 is literally right around the corner, figured now would be a good time. 

So, who am i? Whelp, no one special. I've put Rovers on Duna and Eve (Sandbox), a Successful Mun trip and back with very low fuel remaining in Career mode, and that about sums up what major things i've done. I spend most of my time in KSP trying to design Spaceplanes which is going to be more interesting with the upcoming update. My other hours spent in game have been 3 attempts to build space stations, All ending with a game update and me de-orbiting them.

So i'll be lurking around, may or may not post something here and there or reply to something, but lurking.

\*\*Note about my Username\*\* If it offends you in someway, which i can see happening because it has in the past, Please forgive it. I have had this username for ages on other games,websites and of course steam until recently. So please, if it bugs you in someway, ignore or block me if you wish. Acceptable nicknames are Sui and Sui Pig pig (Ha ha. Farm joke..... No? Never mind then)

Steam username: suicider2012 or search [TV] (Sui) Private Piggingtons

KSP Hours played as of post: 252

KSP Steam screenshots: 123

Welcome Suicider! Glad to have you aboard.

It's always good to see another lurker step up and become part of the community.

Happy landings!
Welcome! I would offer you access to the free Snacks, but it sounds like you already know about those.
Hello! Welcome to the forum. Glad to have you with us.
Hi Sui. Welcome the forum, we are very helpful here.
